name: Memory of Floating Life 浮生录
name_original: Memory of Floating Life 浮生录
description:
• Currently the game only supports Chinese
  • Gameplay video and trailer  https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Ug41117DY
  • Memory of floating life is a deck building game in which you play as an awakened ghost, using your token (the hand) to play against a Taoist priest on a "yin and yang panel" with 8 empty card positions.
  • 《浮生录》是一款 DBG 卡牌对战游戏，玩家扮演一位苏醒的鬼，利用自己生前的信物（手牌）在有8个空牌位的“阴阳浑元盘”上与道士打牌，道士会布下各种“阵法”，你要做的就是用你的手牌破解道士的阵法.
